item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Friday, March 14, 2025 at 2:50 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Cursor told me I should learn coding instead of asking it to generate code (57 points | 13 comments)
2. WebAssembly from the Ground Up – learn WASM by building a compiler (36 points | 14 comments)
3. Can we communally deprecate git checkout? (11 points | 13 comments)
4. Choosing Languages (73 points | 85 comments)
5. Curry: A Truly Integrated Functional Logic Programming Language (16 points | 1 comment)
6. fsync() after open() is an elaborate no-op (5 points | 9 comments)
7. Something Is Rotten in the State of Cupertino (39 points | 45 comments)
8. C plus Prolog (25 points | 6 comments)
9. Xata Agent: AI agent expert in PostgreSQL (3 points | 2 comments)
10. IO devices and latency (7 points | 1 comment)
11. High-performance computing, with much less code (5 points | 1 comment)
12. It's not cheating if you write the video game solver yourself (11 points | 1 comment)
13. How to write a quine (6 points | 3 comments)
14. We should improve libzfs somewhat (12 points | 6 comments)
15. Carefully But Purposefully Oxidising Ubuntu (54 points | 9 comments)
16. The Future is Niri (130 points | 90 comments)
17. Almquist shell (ash) variants (12 points | no comments)
18. What Programming Concepts do you Struggle to Grok or Use in Production? (3 points | no comments)
19. Smoke test your Django admin site (5 points | 3 comments)
20. Dropping RISC-V support (34 points | 58 comments)
21. Typestate Programming (2 points | no comments)
22. Stumbling our way into Solving the World's Oldest Board Game (4 points | 1 comment)
23. Tell Mozilla: It’s time to ditch Google (1 points | no comments)
24. A Perplexing Javascript Parsing Puzzle (27 points | 9 comments)
25. My teen years: Porting Small-C to transputer and developing my operating system (8 points | 1 comment)
